meanings.definition: A book containing stories for children.
meanings.sent1: I read a colorful storybook to my little sister every night.
meanings.sent2: The library has a large collection of storybooks for kids.
meanings.sent3: The storybook was so engaging that even the adults enjoyed it.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a storybook, full of adventures and happy endings.
meanings.sent5: The illustrations in the storybook brought the tales to life.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the stories found in a book.
meanings.sent1: The quaint little town had a storybook charm to it.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a storybook quality, like something from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent3: The storybook garden was meticulously maintained and magical.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a storybook appearance, with its sloping roof and colorful walls.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in a storybook palette of colors.
